bibl.title: A Usurious Monk from the Apa Apollo Monastery at Bawit.
bibl.note: P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1747. Aurelius Amounis, son of Musaeus, acknowledges the receipt of a loan of four solidi from apa or abba Iacubius, son of Danielius, a monk in the monastery of apa Apollo at Titkois (= Bawit). Titkois (Hermopolite nome), 566/7?
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, A Usurious Monk from the Apa Apollo Monastery at Bawit.

P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1747. Aurelius Amounis, son of Musaeus, acknowledges the receipt of a loan of four solidi from apa or abba Iacubius, son of Danielius, a monk in the monastery of apa Apollo at Titkois (= Bawit). Titkois (Hermopolite nome), 566/7?
